column8:
Base_Tier_Score = normalize(PassMark_Score, max_score=21513)

  Normalization Formula:
  - RTX 4090 (21,513 PassMark) ? 10.0 (highest)
  - RTX 4070 (18,161 PassMark) ? 8.5
  - Intel Iris Xe (5,000 PassMark) ? 4.2
  - UHD Graphics (4,500 PassMark) ? 2.1

  Logic: Semakin tinggi PassMark score, semakin tinggi Base Tier Score.

column15:
PassMark Software adalah standard test untuk mengukur performa komponen komputer.     Analogi Sederhana:

  - PassMark seperti TOEFL untuk processor/GPU
  - Memberikan score numerik yang bisa dibandingkan
  - Semakin tinggi score = semakin powerful performanya                                                                             Why We Use It

  Untuk Project Kita:

  - Evidence-based: Bukan asumsi pribadi
  - Fair comparison: Intel vs AMD vs NVIDIA
  - Academic credibility: Research yang valid

column8:
Generation_Multiplier = architecture_performance_gain

  NVIDIA:
  - RTX 40 Series: 1.25 (25% improvement over 30xx)
  - RTX 30 Series: 1.10 (10% improvement over 20xx)
  - RTX 20 Series: 1.00 (baseline Turing)
  - GTX 16 Series: 0.90 (older architecture)

  AMD:
  - RX 6000 Series: 1.05 (RDNA 2 improvement)
  - RX 5000 Series: 0.95 (older RDNA 1)

  Logic: Architecture baru lebih efisien dan powerful.

VRAM_Factor = vram_capacity_impact

  VRAM Scaling:
  - 16GB+: 1.20 (enthusiast workloads, 4K gaming)
  - 8GB: 1.10 (gaming standard, good future-proofing)
  - 6GB: 1.05 (mid-range standard)
  - 4GB: 1.00 (entry-level baseline)
  - Integrated: 0.90 (shared memory penalty)

  Logic: More VRAM = better multitasking and future-proofing.

Final_Score = Base_Tier_Score × Generation_Multiplier × VRAM_Factor

  Contoh: RTX 4060 (8GB)
  - Base: 7.0
  - Generation: 1.25 (RTX 40 series)
  - VRAM: 1.10 (8GB)
  - Final: 7.0 × 1.25 × 1.10 = 9.63
